verses.text: O \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, all ye \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*: \w praise|strong="H7623"\w* him, all ye \w people|strong="H0523"\w*.

For his \w merciful|strong="H2617"\w* \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* is \w great|strong="H1396"\w* toward us: and the \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*. \w Praise|strong="H1984"\w* ye the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*
d*.
